name: Layered Lemon-Tomato Aspic
author: Culinary Envy
summary: Layered lemon-tomato aspic is a chilled jellied salad with a punch of sweet and tart flavors.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package lemon-flavored gelatin (such as Jell-O®)
1 (16 ounce) package small curd 4% cottage cheese
½ cup finely chopped green bell pepper
½ cup finely chopped green onions
directions: Heat tomato sauce in a small saucepan over medium-low heat, about 3 minutes
Stir in lemon-flavored gelatin until dissolved
Remove from heat and stir in cold water and vinegar
Mix cottage cheese, celery, green bell pepper, green onions, parsley, mayonnaise, horseradish, salt, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, and hot sauce in a large bowl
Cover and place in the refrigerator
Pour 1/2 the tomato mixture into an 8-inch square baking dish
Spread cottage cheese mixture over the tomato mixture
Spread remaining tomato mixture over the top and chill until set, about 1 hour more
